summary: Skyrim_Nords are body n face custom re-texturing (n not simple recolour) mod which changes how Nords and some other (humanoid) game races look.
descriptionHtml:
---README---

for DALLs - Skyrim_Nords

v1.9

06/05/2012

Skyrim_Nords are body n face custom re-texturing (n not simple recolor) mod which changes how Nords and some other (humanoid) game races look.*

* Word of warning - my \"cosmetic\" mods - regardless of being adult or not - are made to provide for natural / life-like good looks - so they might not be right for you - if you are seeking some wild / day-dream fantasy!

For me this retexture mod was instant and foremost visual game necessity - as in my opinion - Bethesda\'s Skyrim Nords look too dirty and too much roughed-up even for the most primitive fictional / game barbarians. With it in place - all (in game NPCs) characters will become much better looking, cleaner and more enjoyable. As human (Nord) face / body textures - supplied in this mod - are used as base character textures throughout - all other (Skyrim) humanoid races (Imperials, Bretons, Redguard, varied Elves n Orcs) will get my \"beautifying\"  face n body clean-up as well. Game grime -transparent masks (secondary level of applied body/face dirt) - on your character n NPCs - will stay / won\'t be affected in any way.

As M/F nude-bodies (models) scene is getting quite heated n lively - read there are now many more good models to chose from my semi-clean / wash (at least) once-a-week ;) Nords will receive somewhat different treatment. I can not support all that is out there now but I\'ll try to make at least few (body textures) combinations for models I like to use n consider as good ones. Older versions of this mod have been made for different body models and as they are not so much different from latest ones, they might have right textures combinations (older models / different authors) for bodies of your choice. 

Word of warning: My mod is (new / improved) textures - only! You need to have original body mods (models - body meshes) to be able to use my more recent (body) textures! (Old / early versions of this mod still use in-game body n likes)
 
To install you need to navigate to your Steam/SteamApps/common/skyrim - game folder and paste / drag n drop in it my Data (mod) folder. Allow overwrite!    

If you don\'t like this new look, simply delete / remove my (check for names my mod) loose texture files from Data/textures/actors/character/ (female, male, imperialfemale n imperialmale) and original look will be restored to your game.

Bugs/conflicts: none known - but take care not to overwrite them by accident!

Note on v1.1: As my new / improved female (skin), textures are now de-facto \"nude\" (if used with any nude female meshes mod), I have transferred this mod to adult section. Regardless of this, it still can be used with original game \"dressed\" bodies (body meshes). This particular version is fine-tuned to Nude Female meshes v1.4. These meshes have some UV problems which I have - somewhat - \"corrected\" in my textures.

Note on v1.1a_Fix_Only: It seems that pubic region problem is much more severe then I thought but anyway this is small fix which makes this problem somewhat less
obvious. Install last!

Note on v1.2: Added naked male body as well. Nude Males (meshes) by Thegal were used as conversion clue. Female fix (v1.1a) is now my standard female skin / finish.

Note on v1.3: Somewhat improved female body textures were switched - readjusted to TnT Bodyshop  (female) bodies as they presently fit my needs best. Otherwise same as previous one.

Note on v1.4: Previous version was indeed very short-lived one as some new niggles were found. Anyway, that is sorted and now my \"new\" Nord female should be all right for public consumption. ;)

Note on v1.5: I was very keen to switch to Robert (nude male) meshes as they are more advanced and smoother then present Thegal ones but unfortunately, NV Robert nude male - port is not \"pure\" Robert but stitch-up in-between AlienSlof\'s - Bonner (which is strap on dildo) and Robert male body mesh. As consequence this otherwise brilliant meshes have (model) material mismatch n serious issues with in-game light shaders. This can not be (fully) resolved with textures only. Regardless as I know how some of you \"burn\" to try-on this nice / \"new\" body (with accompanying parts ;) I have made new male-body texture than can be used with Thegal as well as NV Robert. If you are not interested in this one - new - somewhat improved - texture only for Thegal (body model) is supplied as optional extra. If you want to use this one - install it last after main mod file). Beside these male body updates - my original M/F human (Nord n Imperial) face normal maps have been slightly improved.

Note on v1.6: My males - their textures - are back to original - Thegal Nude Male body - while my females are now made to use Dimonized UNP female body meshes. Both were improved and are now for better effect in HD resolution. Skin - joints on female textures are now almost perfect - read in normal use invisible and male pubic area / hairs have been somewhat better groomed n improved. Male textures still can be used with Robert (male) body as well.

Note on v1.7: Some minor female (body) improvements with considerable (hairs definition) improvement of female \"bush\" ;) / pubic hairs. Otherwise same as previous one. 

Note on v1.8: New female face with brand-new - somewhat - darker lips! All game females will benefit - as, pale n lifeless lips female NPCs have are technical problem which can not be resolved - basic female lips have been made darker / given touch of neutral colour rouge. In practical terms all girls in game will now have (a bit) of rouge (lipstick) applied to their lips. Female body is still - Dimonized UNP female - while (new) male textures are for - Better Males (FavoredSoul - Erect) body. 

Note on v1.9: Males improved - their heads n body (both - normal n old) were reworked n improved. Neck / body joint line now much less obvious. Some minor female improvements. Female body textures - Dimonized UNP female - male body textures - Better Males (FavoredSoul - Erect) body. 

Use:
Free to use but if used for modding ask me for permission!

Enjoy and try to remember - if you like it even in a part - to give endorsement!

Thanks to Bethesda for great game.
author: Dall
